1 pound ground chicken,1 tablespoon sesame oil,1 tablespoon soy sauce,1 tablespoon mirin,1 teaspoon kosher salt,1 pinch ground black pepper,1 pinch cayenne pepper,1/3 cup green onions,2 cloves garlic, crushed,2 tablespoons bread crumbs,1 tablespoon ketchup,2 tablespoons hoisin sauce,2 teaspoons fresh ginger,2 tablespoons rice vinegar,4 skewers,,
